code: import React from'react';import'./BottomButtons.css';import List from'@mui/material/List';import ListItem from'@mui/material/ListItem';import ListItemText from'@mui/material/ListItemText';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BottomButtons=function BottomButtons(_ref){var todo=_ref.todo,setTodo=_ref.setTodo;var open=todo.filter(function(task){return task.completed==false;});var num1=open.length;var label1=num1+' Items Left';var completed=todo.filter(function(task){return task.completed!==true;});var handleClick=function handleClick(){setTodo(completed);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{className:"bottom-buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:label1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"clear-completed",onClick:handleClick,children:"Clear Completed"})]})});};export default BottomButtons;
